reviews.text: We made reservations for a group of rooms for family and friends attending our daughter's wedding. We received nothing but rave reviews from those who stayed there from the convenient location, to the "most comfortable nights sleep," to friendly personnel and easy check-in. I only regret I haven't written to tell you how wonderful your part in our daughter's wedding was.
reviews.title: Great place to stay for Wedding Celebration!

reviews.text: Starting with the check in, this hotel blew me away. I've stayed at about 300 hotels so far in my life and without a doubt, this hotel has to be at least in the top 10 of the nicest place to stay on Earth.
reviews.title: This hotel has made me a Wingate fan. The ultimate in hotel stays is here.

reviews.text: Should we ever decide to go back to anywhere near Montgomery, AL, we will be staying here, AND YOU SHOULD TOO!
reviews.title: Marred by small problems

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Also, the Zoo is close, they have a hot tub and a pool. I have 3 kids, 5,3,1 year(s) old and they loved the stay. A bunch of restaurants and a bowling alley near by.The free breakfast rocks; You'll learn how to make your own waffles. (make sure to get the european girl teaches you how to use the waffle iron. She is the Master.) Walmart is about a mile away.
reviews.title: Wingate was home away from home!

reviews.text: Very attractive, comfortable room but the stay was marred by a few things. I was originally given a room on the 2nd floor but when I walked in, I saw that housekeeping had not finished cleaning it. The bed was made & room cleaned up (I think) but the trash cans had not been emptied & the towels & bath amenities had not been replenished. After reporting this, I also realized that the A/C was not working (thermostat set on 60 but room was probably 80.)
reviews.title: Perfect for a Group Stay

reviews.text: I recently stayed at the Wingate on a recommendation of a fellow colleague. This hotel was located on a road behind a restaurant. It was dark and did not feel like a safe place for a woman to arrive at night alone. There was a smell to the hotel. Only general cleaning was done to the room so it could really use a good scrubbing. I would rather pay a little more and stay at a nicer hotel. I will stay at another hotel on my next visit to this area.
reviews.title: Won't stay here again

reviews.text: Located convenient to I-85. Set back from service road, behind sushi restaurant. Plenty of nearby restaurants. Front desk staff was hit and miss, one was very pleasant & helpful and the other was very dry. Housekeeping staff was thorough - they know the meaning of "Do Not Disturb." King Suite had a comfy bed, microwave, frig, coffee maker, nice desk big enough for laptop and paperwork. Free breakfast is just that, free breakfast, though they did have hot items (scrambled eggs & bacon) rather than frozen microwaveable food. Nice pool, fitness center, whirlpool, and business center. Very clean public areas. Big Bugger: couldn't figure out alarm so I called for a wakeup call. Bugger part: one phone and it's on the desk across the room. Decent enough for business, would never stay for leisure.
reviews.title: Decent enough for business

reviews.text: We got a GREAT deal on this hotel through Hotwire for $57/night. My parents and I got single King rooms/a piece. There was amazing decor, minus the tv (no flat screens), free internet, good hot breakfast (waffles, eggs, meat, cereal, muffins, coffee, juices). The only pitfall was the bathroom, clearly needs updating but overall it was okay for me at this price for 2 nights. I would stay here again, if I were in town (doubt it, but would stay at another Wingate). The hotel is right off of 85 and near various food and shopping outlets and 2 Super Walmarts.
reviews.title: Nice bargain--Great breakfast

reviews.text: Decent & Clean, only issue was the A/C unit wouldnt turn off and was very loud. Memory Foam beds are nice.
reviews.title: Nice Hotel

reviews.text: Breakfast was excellent, great selection of hot & cold items. Ive already made reservations for my next stay.
reviews.title: Best bed available - very happy with hotel chain

reviews.text: Booked as a 3 star through Hotwire. Hard to find in the dark, GPS didn't recognize the address, clean room without all toiletries (hotel was out of lotion), facial tissue was cheap & scratchy but the NOISE was unbelieveable. I thought the ceiling would cave in from the people upstairs walking around. Got 3 1/2 straight hours of sleep! Please take a top floor if you stay here. I can handle doors and carts throughout but these were built very cheaply.
reviews.title: NOISY!!!

reviews.text: As all of my experiences with this chain have been positive, this one was scarred a bit. Very, very nice property which may be a bit short on parking but all in all, a nice place. Very nicely appointed rooms. Spacious, relaxing. Bed was very comfortable. My only difficulties were the $100 cash deposit upon checkin for "incidentals" and the terrible high speed internet. IT ACTUALLY WAS A NO SPEED CONNECTION! So, I asked why I posted $100 for incidentals and had a no speed connection?? Wasn't that an incidentals for which the hotel had implied a guarantee to perform?? Got nowhere with that one.
reviews.title: Very nice room with NO WIFI
So far so good with Wingate... never disappointed
reviews.text: The hotel's 100% satisfaction guarantee is a charade. Doesn't exist! Try doing something about it. Probably wouldn't stay again.

My husband and our two teenage daughters stayed at the Wingate Inn on our way to Panama City. We found the hotel with no problems. Check in was quick and smooth. The front desk staff was very friendly.
reviews.title: Good breakfast; otherwise, somewhat average

reviews.text: Our room had 2 king beds and was very clean and comfortable. The decor and furniture were modern and very very comfy. The bed and bedding were awesome.
reviews.title: Shocking smell and very dirty Stay AWAY

reviews.text: For what it’s worth, I cannot recommend. Old room furnishings, less than adequate for $$$. SMALL bathroom. On the up-side, great bed.
reviews.title: On the up-side, great bed.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Hotel sits off the service road and main road so there's very little traffic noise. The rooms were decorated very nicely and the mattresses are so comfortable. The bed linens were very soft, not starchy or rough like other places I've stayed. There was a coffee maker, refrigerator and microwave that made left overs and drinks easy. Plenty of space. The air conditioner worked great and didn't make a loud noise when cycling on and off. The breakfast was tasty and hot and fresh. Had a great make it yourself waffle maker. The hotel staff was very friendly. Maintenace and housekeeping always pushed the elevator buttons for us and opened doors. I think in an effort to save money they had turned all the a/c's on hall floors to fan only. It happened to be in the high 70's while we were there so the halls were HOT. The hot tub was drained and not working our entire stay, not that I would have used it anyway, Overall a good experience. It's not a luxury hotel but it was very nice for what we needed. A place to sleep and relax while visiting friends and family for an early Christmas.
reviews.title: overall good experience

reviews.text: Excellent hotel. Good service, comfortable bed, quiet. Lots of restaurants and activity in area. Convenient to but not right on I 85.
reviews.title: Good choice at Mongomery
Just about perfect
reviews.text: At this price point things should be very nearly perfect, in my opinion, and they were. This place is super clean and very well run. It's also really quiet -- it's about a mile from the interstate and about 1/4 mile back from the main road. I woke up every morning listening to the birds in the field out back, and couldn't hear any traffic noise at all. Hot sauce at breakfast was a thoughtful touch.

Gym was average -- cardio equipment and one of those cheap machines that never works right. I'd love it if these places had a few free weights, but people would probably steal them. The pool out back seemed really nice and in a nice location.
reviews.title: Absolutely Recommended!!!!

likes.liked: — Everything--it was perfect and totally recommended to everyone.
likes.disliked: — It was difficult to leave because I felt so at home there!!
